channel.title: Wifi on Amoghavarsha
channel.description: Recent content in Wifi on Amoghavarsha

item.title: How To Connect To WiFi Via Terminal
item.description: Do you remember the meme, which goes, “I’m connecting to my WiFi using terminal, my friends…HACKER”? I have never seen anyone doing that in real life. But nowadays I have a strong reason to do that in the presence or absence of my friends. For some weird reasons, my desktop environments are breaking the much needed nm-applet.For those who don’t know what nm-applet is, it’s the WiFi icon that you generally see on the top or bottom right of your screen, which shows you the networks available.
